alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 4:01AM MST until December 31 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches will combine with moderate to strong wind to cause heavy drifting of snow and low visibility in blowing snow. * WHERE....Bear River Mountains, Big Hole Mountains, including state route 36 through Emigrant Pass and the town of Victor. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility and cause road closures as snow clearance efforts are pushed to their limit. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. If going out for First Night and New Year`s Eve events, dress appropriately.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
